resume.title: Resume
resume.about-text: Trainee software developer (application development) in Germany with an economic background. I was born in Ukraine and have been living in Germany since 2022. After finishing school, I completed vocational training and later obtained a university degree in economics. My academic education includes a Bachelor's degree in Business Administration and a Specialist diploma in Finance. Both degrees are officially recognized in Germany. After several years of professional experience as an economist and later as a self-employed content manager and online marketing specialist, I decided to change my career path towards IT and software development.

legal.title: Legal Notice
legal.text1: Responsible for content according to § 55 Abs. 2 RStV:
legal.text2:
The content of this website has been created with the greatest possible care. However, no guarantee is given for the accuracy, completeness or timeliness of the content.

Liability for Links
This website contains links to external third-party websites. The respective operator is solely responsible for their content.

Copyright
The content and works created by the site operator on this website are subject to copyright law. Any use outside the limits of copyright requires the prior written consent of the author.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.text:
Collection of personal data
Personal data (e.g. name, email) is only collected if you voluntarily provide it, for example via the contact form or email. The data is used exclusively to process your request and will not be shared with third parties.

Hosting
This website is hosted on GitHub Pages. Anonymous visitor data (traffic statistics) may be collected by GitHub. I have no influence on this process.

Cookies and Tracking
No cookies or analytics/tracking tools are used.

Your Rights
You have the right to request information about your stored data, correct inaccurate data, or request deletion of your data at any time.

After entering the password, you will be able to view my information and download my resume.
